original_text: “And this is the law for the Nazirite, when the time of his separation has been completed: he shall be brought to the entrance of the tent of meeting,
korean_text: 나실인의 법은 이러하니라 자기의 몸을 구별한 날이 차면 그 사람을 회막 문으로 데리고 갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: And this is the law for the Nazirite,
when the time of his separation has been completed:
he shall be brought to the entrance of the tent of meeting,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 회막 입구로 데려가야 할 것입니다,
